data.persona: I am a very good lawyer. I always win in my cases. I would like to work as a district attorney.
data.description:
You are in the The prayer room.
It is serene and quiet. Some old gods and goddess statues are on the altar. They are made out of pure gold with some jewel for the ornaments. The red carpet welcomed the visitor and soon as you walk in, you can see the bright gold pillars surrounding the room.
There's an ornament and a goddess here.
The king is here.

You are carrying a book and a pen, and wearing a Handkerchief.

data.short_motivation: I want the king to have a copy of the book of the laws and a pen
data.mid_motivation: I hope the king starts to  read the book from today
data.long_motivation: I hole to have a discussion about the contents of the book with the king in a few weeks
